data.title: Get $2.8K Credits & Access To Kissflow Digital Workplace Platform
data.meta_description: Kissflow allows businesses to manage all types of work on a unified platform through an intuitive blend of collaboration, coordination, & control.
data.text:
Details:

Great customer experiences and innovation are driven by data.

Mixpanel helps anyone answer questions about user behavior in seconds, without analytics expertise. This enables product development teams to act faster to improve experiences, engage users and drive growth.

Eligible startups get $50,000 in credits towards the Mixpanel Growth plan. The credits will be valid for 1 year and cover costs for the plan as well as additional data fees.

T&C:

The Mixpanel Startup Program is available if you were founded less than 2 years ago, have raised no more than $5M in funding, and are not currently on any of Mixpanel's paid plans.

*This offering can be redeemed as per Mixpanel’s eligibility rules & discretion.

Details:

Get up to $50K in Segment credits (enough to track 200,000 users for - free for up to two years!)

T&C:

You can avail the Segment’s Team Plan If You Are:

1. Early Stage (2-3 years old)

2. Raised less than $5M

*This offering can be redeemed as per Segment’s eligibility rules & discretion.

Details:

1. Unlimited instant access to MBBS qualified doctors 24x7 for employees + Dependents (Spouse+kids)

2. Unlimited access to mental wellness counselors on chat, phone, or even F2F consults (if suggested) for employees

3. 1 free annual health check for employee (including basic vitals, sugar, Thyroid, Lipid and Kidney profiles)

4. 1 free diet consult and diet chart for employee or spouse

5. Up to 20% off on medicines ordered online through the Ekincare app across 1000+ cities

6. Up to 40% off on additional paid health checks for employee and dependents across 3000+ diagnostic centers pan India

7. Free dental and vision consultations at Ekincare's partners and 20% of additional procedures (Can be organized as a camp at office premises as well)

8. Access to fitness sessions across 6000+ gyms and fitness studios pan India including activities like Zumba, Yoga, Swimming, CrossFit, etc.

9. Corporate dashboard - a self-service portal where the HR/Founder can access real-time utilization data and health trends about their employees

T&C:

*This offering can be redeemed as per Ekincare’s eligibility rules & discretion.

Details:

1. Automated payroll - Set up a payroll date and ensure your employees get paid on time

2. Compliance - Handle all statutory payments like TDS, PF, PT, and ESI along with their returns

3. Employee self-service - Empower your employees to access payslips and Form-16, declare investments, and request reimbursements

4. Time & leave management - Track leaves along with real-time attendance through biometric devices or APIs

5. Insights & reports - Access salary registers, TDS challans, employee documents, etc. all in one place

6. Group health insurance - Avail group health insurance even if your company size is less than 7

All you need to do is get your employee data into the product and let Opfin do the rest.

T&C:

*This offering can be redeemed as per Opfin’s eligibility rules & discretion.

Details:

1. Get enough data to help you in your product-market fit journey with access to 20 Mn events per month.

2. Get full access to Amplitude’s paid growth plan, with features including behavioural cohorts, predictive analytics, advanced collaboration, & more.

T&C:

1. Your company was launched less than 2 years ago

2. You’ve received less than $5 Mn in funding

3. You have fewer than 20 employees

4. You are not an existing Amplitude customer

5. You have never used Amplitude’s Startup Scholarship before

*This offering can be redeemed as per Amplitude’s eligibility rules & discretion.

Details:

Access to Stackby online spreadsheet-database platform for 3 months up to 10 users

Build any type of a workflow

Users can build a database from scratch, import data from pre-existing sources like spreadsheets or Google Sheets, or choose from over 100 pre-built templates across multiple categories like Marketing, Sales, Project Management, HR, Product, and more. It’s as easy to use as a spreadsheet.

25+ Unique column types

Choose from over 25 unique column types like text, number, date/time, collaborators, dropdowns, ratings, add formulas for automated computation, bring in attachments from a computer or cloud storage, or link records between tables to define relationships, reference data from a different table altogether via lookup or aggregation.

Connect columns to third party services

Users can also connect columns to popular third-party APIs like YouTube, Google Analytics, Facebook, MailChimp, SerpStat, Hunter.io, Clearbit, GitHub, etc., and let Stackby pull the desired information automatically via pre-built API functions.Users can select specific data from the API response using a built-in JSON data explorer and configure the column(s). Once set, refresh the cells to get data in real-time.

Visualize data and work in different layouts

Not just a table. Visualize and work with data in multiple data layouts - Table, Kanban, Calendar, Gallery, Custom Forms, and Internal updatable forms. Configure your data with powerful filters, search, and sort. Embed databases anywhere and share it with the world.

Collaborate with your team from anywhere

All updates are synced automatically to enable collaboration in real-time by also adding comments and checklists, setting reminders, even sending slack notifications for individual rows.

Mobile Apps

With native mobile apps (Android, iOS), you can take Stackby anywhere you are.

Integrate with over 2000+ apps

Stackby integrates with your favorite tools and services via Zapier or Integromat. You can connect to thousands of apps or services or even access the data programmatically via our API.

T&C:

*This offering can be redeemed as per Stackby’s eligibility rules & discretion.
